name: 2022 3rd International Conference on Intelligent Computing and Human-Computer Interaction
content: 2022 3rd International Conference on Intelligent Computing and Human-Computer Interaction (ICHCI 2022), organized by Guangzhou Youth Science and Technology Workers Association and Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area (Guangdong) Talent Port, and co-organized by Academic Information Exchange Center(AEIC), it will be held in Guangzhou, China from August 12 to 14, 2022\. Welcome to ICHCI 2022 with theme of “Acess Future with IC and HCI”. Scholars, researchers and students are invited to actively publish unpublished original research papers and important ongoing papers and research results in the field of intelligent computing and human-computer interaction; And warmly welcome domestic and foreign universities, scientific research institutions experts, scholars, business people and other relevant personnel to participate in the conference exchange.
organizers: Guangzhou Youth Science and Technology Workers Association、Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Are
